TEXT.TITLE: FIRST UNION <FUNC.O> COMPLETES ACQUISITIONS
TEXT.BODY: First Union Corp said it completed the acquisition of two Florida-based banks, North Port Bank, based in North Port, and City Commerical Bank, based in Sarasota. Reuter
